name: Out In Space (DJ_Shukla)
description:
This game  is made for Mega JAM Game jam 2021.

Live as a astronaut: Complete all your tasks on the ship to win, but watch out the doors are closing rapidly so complete the task as fast as u can .Hope you do it!

PC Controls:

  •  WASD - Moving
  • F- Flashlight ON/OFF
  • Mouse - Camera movement
